author: Chinn Park MAGIC
text:
Hello,
We are seeking information on benchmarks, best practices and model policies for law enforcement motorcycle equipment, operations and training. 
This may include, but not be limited to any written directives specific to the law enforcement motorcycle function pertaining to traffic enforcement, traffic direction and control, role in traffic collision investigation, motorist assistance, escort services, response procedures, personal protective equipment and risk management, allocation and distribution of personnel, personnel selection criteria and procedures, program and personnel evaluation, line and staff inspections, goals and objectives, any analysis of cost: benefit or return on investment, training, supervision, and the selection and equipping of motorcycles, uniforms and equipment.
We appreciate any assistance you can provide. 
Karen Garrett
Management and Government Information Center (MAGIC)
